meanings.sent1: My desiderata include a warm blanket and a good book.
meanings.sent2: She carefully wrote down her desiderata before going shopping.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting my desiderata of snacks, I only brought water to the movie.
meanings.sent4: His desiderata of success shone brightly in his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The desiderata of peace and happiness guided her every decision.

meanings.definition: A list of desired items or goals.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out a desiderata for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent2: Creating a desiderata helped him prioritize his tasks.
meanings.sent3: The desiderata for the camping trip included marshmallows and bug spray.
meanings.sent4: Her desiderata were like stars in the night sky, guiding her path.
meanings.sent5: The desiderata on his vision board motivated him to work harder.
